ids_info.name: ec_launchers
ids_info.description: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.

ec_launchers/mirror.documentation: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.

ec_launchers/mirror/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher.

ec_launchers/mirror/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “Mirror in upper port 12”. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry.documentation: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/geometry_ty.documentation: Geometry of the object contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

options.name: polygonal
options.description: Contour described by a polygonal outline in the (X1, X2) plane

options.name: circular
options.description: Circle in the (X1, X2) plane, defined by its centre and radius

options.name: rectangle
options.description: Rectangle in the (X1, X2) plane, defined by its centre and widths in the X1 and X2 directions

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/geometry_ty.documentation: Short string identifier. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within geometry_type container: Geometry of the object contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within geometry_type container: Geometry of the object contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below.

Verbose description. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within geometry_type container: Geometry of the object contour. Note that there is some flexibility in the choice of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3). The data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/curvature_t.documentation: Curvature of the object. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

options.name: cylindrical_x1
options.description: Cylindrical in the X1 direction, use x1_curvature

options.name: cylindrical_x2
options.description: Cylindrical in the X2 direction, use x2_curvature

options.name: spherical
options.description: Spherical : same curvature radius in X1 and X2 directions, indicated in x1_curvature

options.name: toroidal
options.description: Toroidal : x1_curvature in X1 direction and x2_curvature in X2 direction

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/curvature_t.documentation: Short string identifier. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within curvature_type container: Curvature of the object.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/centre.documentation: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the object. This origin is located within the object area and should be the middle point of the object surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular object. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular object. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/centre/r.documentation: Major radius. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within centre container: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the object. This origin is located within the object area and should be the middle point of the object surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular object. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular object.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/centre/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within centre container: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the object. This origin is located within the object area and should be the middle point of the object surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular object. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular object.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/centre/z.documentation: Height. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within centre container: Coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the object. This origin is located within the object area and should be the middle point of the object surface. If geometry_type=2, it's the centre of the circular object. If geometry_type=3, it's the centre of the rectangular object.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/radius.documentation: Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type/index = 2. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x1_unit_vec.documentation: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

Component along X axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Y axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Z axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x2_unit_vec.documentation: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

Component along X axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Y axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Z axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x3_unit_vec.documentation: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the object surface and oriented towards the plasma. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

Component along X axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the object surface and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Y axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the object surface and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Z axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the object surface and oriented towards the plasma.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x1_width.documentation: Full width of the object in the X1 direction, used only if geometry_type/index = 3. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x2_width.documentation: Full width of the object in the X2 direction, used only if geometry_type/index = 3. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the object in the (X1, X2) coordinate system, used only if geometry_type/index=1. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/outline/x1.documentation: Positions along x1 axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the object in the (X1, X2) coordinate system, used only if geometry_type/index=1. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/outline/x2.documentation: Positions along x2 axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the object in the (X1, X2) coordinate system, used only if geometry_type/index=1. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x1_curvatur.documentation: Radius of curvature in the X1 direction, to be filled only for curvature_type/index = 2, 4 or 5. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/x2_curvatur.documentation: Radius of curvature in the X2 direction, to be filled only for curvature_type/index = 3 or 5. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/geometry/surface.documentation: Surface of the object, derived from the above geometric data. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within geometry container: Description of the geometry of the mirror, in its reference position.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement.documentation: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “Core mirror steering”. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/type.documentation: Type of movement. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/type/name.documentation: Short string identifier. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements. Within type container: Type of movement.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/type/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements. Within type container: Type of movement.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/type/descri.documentation: Verbose description. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements. ec_launchers/mirror/movement/direction.documentation: Unit vector indicating the direction of the translation or the rotation axis at "home" position (i.e. ../../geometry/centre). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/direction/x.documentation: Component along X axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements. ec_launchers/mirror/movement/direction/y.documentation: Component along Y axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. ec_launchers/mirror/movement/direction/z.documentation: Component along Z axis. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. ec_launchers/mirror/movement/translation.documentation: Maximum displacement with respect to reference position, along the direction vector. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

Minimum displacement with respect to reference position, along the direction vector. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/rotation_an.documentation: Maximum angular displacement with respect to the reference position, counter-clockwise around the direction vector. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/translation.documentation: Linear displacement from reference position, along the direction vector. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within mirror container: Set of mirrors associated with the launcher. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/rotation_an.documentation: Angular displacement with respect to the reference position, counter-clockwise around the direction vector. Within movement container: Set of degrees of freedom for this mirror, allowing the mirror to move around its reference position indicated in ../geometry. Can be cascaded for composite movements.

ec_launchers/mirror/movement/time.documentation: Time base used for the dynamic quantities at this level. ec_launchers/beam.documentation: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.

ec_launchers/beam/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. ec_launchers/beam/power_launched.documentation: Beam power launched into the vacuum vessel. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within power_launched container: Beam power launched into the vacuum vessel.

Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within power_launched container: Beam power launched into the vacuum vessel.

ec_launchers/beam/mirror_index.documentation: Index of the mirror (in the mirror array of structure) on which this beam has been reflected. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/direction/kr.documentation: Component along the major radius. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within direction container: Wavevector at launch point.

ec_launchers/beam/direction/kz.documentation: Component along the vertical direction. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within direction container: Wavevector at launch point.

ec_launchers/beam/direction/kphi.documentation: Component along the toroidal direction. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within direction container: Wavevector at launch point.

ec_launchers/beam/polarization.documentation: Wave polarization. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/polarization/mode.documentation: Polarization mode, O|X|mixed. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within polarization container: Wave polarization.

ec_launchers/beam/polarization/azimuthal.documentation: Poincare sphere angle psi for mixed mode. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within polarization container: Wave polarization.

ec_launchers/beam/polarization/elliptici.documentation: Poincare sphere angle chi for mixed mode. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within polarization container: Wave polarization.

ec_launchers/beam/polarization/time.documentation: Time base used for polarization quantities. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within polarization container: Wave polarization.

ec_launchers/beam/steering_angle_pol.documentation: Steering angle of the EC beam in the R,Z plane (from the -R axis towards the -Z axis), angle_pol=atan2(-k_Z,-k_R), where k_Z and k_R are the Z and R components of the mean wave vector in the EC beam. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/steering_angle_tor.documentation: Steering angle of the EC beam away from the poloidal plane that is increasing towards the positive phi axis, angle_tor=arcsin(k_phi/k), where k_phi is the component of the wave vector in the phi direction and k is the length of the wave vector. Here the term wave vector refers to the mean wave vector in the EC beam. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/spot.documentation: Spot ellipse characteristics at launch. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/spot/size.documentation: Size of the spot ellipse: distance between the central ray and the peripheral rays in the horizontal (first index of the first coordinate) and vertical direction (second index of the first coordinate). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within spot container: Spot ellipse characteristics at launch.

ec_launchers/beam/spot/angle.documentation: Rotation angle for the spot ellipse. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within spot container: Spot ellipse characteristics at launch.

ec_launchers/beam/phase.documentation: Phase ellipse characteristics at launch. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/beam/phase/curvature.documentation: Inverse curvature radii for the phase ellipse, positive/negative for divergent/convergent beams, in the horizontal direction (first index of the first coordinate) and in the vertical direction (second index of the first coordinate). Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within phase container: Phase ellipse characteristics at launch.

ec_launchers/beam/phase/angle.documentation: Rotation angle for the phase ellipse. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors. Within phase container: Phase ellipse characteristics at launch.

ec_launchers/beam/time.documentation: Time base used for launching_position, angle, spot and phase quantities. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies. Within beam container: Set of Electron Cyclotron beam segments, including between mirrors.

ec_launchers/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.

ec_launchers/time.documentation: Generic time. Within ec_launchers IDS: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
